title: New year, new job
author: Tom Maier
content:
This new year I will leave Microsoft to start a new company. The company aims to be a network for teenagers that want to get in touch with tech companies.
 I'm very excited about this project and I hope it turns out well. I'm surrounding myself with people as smart as me or more so that we won't fail.

title: Gap Year in Spain finished
author: Jared Hoffmann
content:
I can't believe this year is over already. It's been thirteen months since I got that plane from Melbourne to Madrid. By the time I took it, I didn't know everything that was going to happen to me.
First I ended up in Villanueva de La Ca√±ada, a small village in the province of Madrid that turned out to be full of religious extremists. For this reason it was not easy to make friends there.
After that I moved to the capital, Madrid, and there's where the fun begun. Madrid is honestly a city in which you cannot get bored. It's full of parks, bars, clubs, museums and restaurants, and the people of Madrid are very welcoming. If only the city had a proper bike lane, I would certainly live there for ever.
